text: -vAnta#M gaqtvA &pa#thAqt panthAqmapi# yaqntyathOq yathAq vahI#yasA pratiqsAraqM ~Mvaha#nti tAqdRugEqva tacCandA(gg)#syaqnyO$&nyasya# lOqkamaqBya#ddhyAyaqn tAnyEqtEnaiqva dEqvA vya#vAhayannaindravAyaqvasyaq vA EqtadAqyata#naqM ~Myacca#tuqrthamahaqstasmi#-nnAgrayaqNO gRu#hyatEq tasmA#dAgrayaqNasyAq &&*yata#nE navaqmE&ha#nnaindravAyaqvO gRu#hyatE Suqkrasyaq vA EqtadAqyata#naqM ~Myat pa#~jcaqma - [  ] 32
